content:
ToolStripGripDisplayStyle Enum

Definition

Specifies the orientation of the ToolStrip move handle (grip).

In this Article

public enum ToolStripGripDisplayStyle
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ToolStripGripDisplayStyle

Fields

Horizontal

Specifies a horizontal orientation for the ToolStrip move handle (grip).
Vertical

Specifies a vertical orientation for the ToolStrip move handle (grip).
